_json.gridTitle: Surviving Holidays With Chronic Illness - Grace IS Sufficient
_json.description: The holiday season is supposed to be the most joyful time of the year. It's the time we celebrate the birth of Christ! But when you're chronically ill this season feels much, much different. It's hard to be thankful when life isn't the way you wanted it to be.   Instead of: Joy - Celebration - Merriment   It feels like: Loneliness - Juggling - Overwhelm - Stress - Guilt - Anxiety â€“ Jealousy  #holidayhacks #christmas #chronicillnesswarrior #chronicillness #invisibleillness #holidaysurvivaltips
